page.title: 13Technology in our homes.
page.content: In almost every home one finds{gadgets which make use of modern technology. These are powered by{electricty}which is made from{coal}and{oil.}In our {bathrooms}electric scales have a digital read out and we have electronic showers.In our{kitchens}are can openers,food blenders,deep fat fryers,micro-wave ovens, fridge freezers, cookers, dish-washers and washing machines.In our{bedrooms}clock radios,electric blankets and hair rollers.In the{lounge}televisions, video and cassette recorders,and disc players.{Children}have electronic games and calculators.We have {telephones}and can speak all over the world.Many people have{computers}for entertainment and for business. Technology has improved{buildings}such as double glazing, P.V.C window frames and cavity wall insulation.
